title: Build & Publish
description: Plugin for managing Cocos Creator build process
empty_task_holder: No build tasks currently, please create new
empty_scene: No scene files in current project, please create scene first
empty_platforms: Platform plugins missing! Please check if platform plugin repository is properly initialized
bundle_common_chunk_tips: Include all dependent common scripts in Bundle to ensure Bundle can be loaded independently across projects. This option only takes effect when building Bundle only, and will be disabled by default during normal builds.

tips.task_name: Consistent with the actual package name generated after build, will overwrite existing build tasks and corresponding folder contents
tips.build_path: The built package will be placed in a new folder created under this path
tips.build_scenes: Only check the scenes that need to be published to reduce the package size after build.
tips.atlas_in_resources: Current auto atlas resource ({info}) placed in auto atlas under {root} will generate original spriteFrame, Texture2D and new atlas resources simultaneously, it is recommended to move auto atlas out of {root}
tips.use_texture_in_atlas: Texture resource ({info}) in atlas has been directly used by other resources ({useInfo}), will retain both original resource data and new atlas resource data causing package size increase, it is recommended to move current texture resource out of atlas folder
tips.use_image_in_atlas: Image resource ({info}) in atlas has been directly used by other resources ({useInfo}), will retain both original resource data and new atlas resource data causing package size increase, it is recommended to move current resource out of atlas folder
tips.task_exist: Current build task ({taskName}) already exists, please wait
tips.task_busy: Please wait for current build task to finish before building again
tips.platform_missing: Platform {platform} does not exist, please enable or download corresponding platform plugin
tips.conflict_platform: Current plugin name {pkgName} conflicts with internal platform name, will override editor built-in platform plugin causing corresponding platform build unavailable, please modify plugin name.
tips.scene_in_bundle: Scenes in Bundle are required and not allowed to be configured as main scene
tips.create_application_template_overwrite: Do you want to overwrite the source file?
tips.application_ejs_version: The application.ejs version used is lower than the version used by current editor, please check and upgrade
tips.set_splash_setting: Go to project settings to configure splash screen
tips.pause_asset_import: Resources are being built, asset database import is currently paused, please wait for build completion before performing asset operations.
tips.disable_platform: Platform {platform} does not exist, cannot add this platform
tips.disable_platform_for_build_command: Platform {platform} does not exist, cannot build this platform
tips.disable_register_platform_info: Platform {platform} does not exist, does not support registering any content to this platform
tips.platform_information_invalid: Please correctly fill in the popup information for platform ({platform}) before building.
tips.template_version_warning: The version {version} of build template ({platform}) used by current project is inconsistent with the version {internalConfig} in editor, please update build template in time.
tips.build_package_missing: Current build task file ({dest}) does not exist, please rebuild!

error.build_path_contains_chinese_and_symbol: Publish path cannot contain Chinese characters or special symbols
error.project_name_not_legal: Project name is illegal, can only contain these characters: [0-9], [a-z], [A-Z], [_].
error.package_name_not_legal: Package name is illegal, can only contain these characters: [0-9], [a-z], [A-Z], [_], [.].
error.package_name_start_with_number: Package name cannot start with a number
error.select_scenes_to_build: Please select scenes to start building
error.path_too_long_desc: In Windows environment, please keep publish path length less than %{max_length} characters to avoid native platform compilation failure
error.keep_raw_texture_of_atlas: Original image %{texturePath} has been packed into auto atlas %{pacPath}, but since this original image is also directly used by %{assetPath}, the original image will still be retained.
error.run_hooks_failed: Hook function {funcName} of build plugin {pkgName} execution failed, please check plugin code logic~
error.cache_compress_texture_missing: Image resource {format} format texture image ({path}) is missing, will directly skip format data writing for this resource.
error.deserialize_failed: Resource {url} deserialization failed, please check resource serialization file and whether script components used are normal.
error.missing_import_files: Resource import file {path} is missing, please check if resource {url} is imported normally or has been deleted
error.required_asset_missing: Resource ({fatherUrl}) referenced resource ({uuid}) cannot be found in project, please check if this resource failed to import or was accidentally deleted.
error.missing_asset: Cannot find resource ({uuid}, please check if this resource failed to import or was accidentally deleted.
error.check_options_failed: Build parameter validation failed, please check parameter values first, modify correctly before building.
error.unknown_platform: Invalid platform, please enter correct platform name.
error.asset_import_failed: Invalid resource {asset({url})}, {type} please check project logs to confirm if resource import is abnormal.
error.get_asset_json_failed: Failed to get resource {asset({url})} serialization data, please confirm if resource import is abnormal first
error.texture_compress_failed: Resource ({asset}) {type} format generation failed, current texture compression tool {toolsPath} may be incompatible with your device, it is recommended to upgrade device or refer to {toolHomePage} to change tool version.
error.missing_splash_tips: Splash screen image copy failed, please check if splash screen configuration data is normal, splashScreen: {splashScreen}
error.invalid_start_scene: Current initial scene does not exist or is in Bundle, cannot be set as initial scene.
error.missing_scenes: Scene {url} may have been deleted, please remove this scene from configuration or reselect all scenes
error.bundle_configs: Bundle-only build must select at least one Bundle
error.platform_register_error: Cannot find target platform {platform}, please check if platform plugin is started normally
error.engine_modules_config_key_missing: Engine module configuration item in build configuration does not exist, please reconfigure engine module configuration item

warn.no_defined_in_i18n: {name} field is not defined in editor i18n
warn.no_serialized_json: Resource ({url},{type}) does not have serialized resource
warn.same_load_url: Resource {urlA} and resource {urlB} have the same dynamic load URL ({url}), please adjust directory structure to avoid exceptions when dynamically loading resources.
warn.atlas_in_resources: Auto atlas resource {url} is in {root} directory, will ignore 'Filter Unused Resources' option and generate atlas containing all small images
warn.path_not_exist: Current path does not exist, please check file
warn.http: Invalid address, please fill in correct URL address starting with 'http(s)'
warn.required: This option is required and cannot be empty
warn.no_chinese: This option does not allow Chinese characters
warn.check_failed_with_new_value: Build parameter {key} ({value}) validation failed, {error}, will use default value {newValue}
warn.compress_rgb_a: Image resource {uuid} has no transparent channel, cannot compress to RGBA type texture format, automatically filtered, please check texture compression configuration
warn.asset_bundle_is_remote_invalid: Bundle {directoryName} is configured as remote bundle, build platform has not configured remote server address, may cause runtime exceptions
warn.require_mipmaps: When RequireMipmaps of shader ({effectUUID}) is enabled, associated texture ({textureUUID}) please enable 'Generate Mipmaps' option, otherwise rendering results may be incorrect.
warn.invalid_custom_splash: Custom splash screen enable failed, will use default splash screen for build. To enable custom splash screen function, please go to Project Settings -> Splash Screen Settings to complete relevant information.
warn.invalid_remove_splash: Remove splash screen configuration failed, will use default splash screen for build. To activate remove splash screen function, please go to Project -> Build & Publish -> Edit Build Project Configuration to complete relevant information.
warn.exception_remove_splash: Network exception, remove splash screen configuration failed.
warn.resources_remote_lock_waring: resources directory is configured as remote bundle by default, will ignore all remote bundle configurations of original configuration
warn.repeat_atlas_in_bundle:
Atlas {asset({Atlas})} is referenced by both {bundle1} and {bundle2}. This will cause atlas to be copied multiple times and included in package files, increasing package size.
Consider the following optimization options to optimize your bundle configuration and reduce package size: 
    1. Adjust bundle priority to ensure Atlas is only included in priority bundle.
    2. Carefully check atlas usage in various bundles and merge it into single bundle when possible.
warn.engine_modules_fall_back_tip: Some modules {fallbackMsg} in current engine module configuration are not supported on current platform {platform}, will be automatically removed or fallback to other modules
warn.invalid_option_in_separate_engine: When separate engine is checked, engine defaults to release mode, debug mode/SourceMap options are invalid for engine compilation results
warn.separate_engine_with_custom_engine: When using custom engine, separate engine plugin is invalid, will automatically close separate engine option
warn.invalid_version_in_separate_engine: Non-official version does not support separate engine plugin, will automatically close separate engine option

tasks.build_json: Build grouped json and scattered files to specified location
tasks.build_suffix: Add MD5 suffix to all resources
tasks.sort_asset: Query used resources and resource bundle configuration
tasks.sort_script: Organize script grouping and script data
tasks.sort_texture: Organize merge compress Texture2D JSON data

settings.options: Organize some build option data to settings.json
settings.design_resolution: Fill design resolution data to settings.json
settings.group: Organize resource grouping, generate packedAssets and rawAssets data
settings.md5: Generate md5AssetsMap from suffixMap to settings.json

asset_bundle.priority_tooltip: When multiple Bundles reference the same resource, the resource will be exported to the Bundle with the highest priority, if multiple Bundles have equal priority will be exported to multiple Bundles simultaneously
asset_bundle.compression_type_tooltip:
Compression options for Bundle optimization, developers can customize compression type for all Bundles including built-in Bundles.
【Merge Dependencies】: When building Asset Bundle, JSON files of mutually dependent resources will be merged together, thereby reducing runtime load request times.
【No Compression】: No compression operation when building Asset Bundle.
【Merge All JSON】: When building Asset Bundle, all resource JSON files will be merged into one, thereby maximizing request reduction, but may increase single resource load time.
【Mini Game Subpackage】: On mini game platforms that provide subpackage functionality, Asset Bundle will be set as corresponding platform subpackage.
【Zip】: On some mini game platforms, when building Asset Bundle, resource files will be compressed into one Zip file, thereby reducing runtime load request times.
asset_bundle.target_platform_tooltip: Different platforms can use different configurations, build will use corresponding platform settings to build Bundle
asset_bundle.remote_bundle_invalid_tooltip: Bundle remote bundle configuration is only valid after configuring remote server address
asset_bundle.subpackage_tooltip: Set Bundle as subpackage on corresponding platform
asset_bundle.merge_dep_tooltip: Try to merge JSON files of mutually dependent resources together, thereby reducing runtime load request times
asset_bundle.merge_all_json_tooltip: Merge all resource JSON files into one, on Web platform, will maximize request reduction, but may increase single resource load time, you can enable as needed, we don't recommend enabling this option on native platform, as it will increase hot update package size
asset_bundle.zip_tooltip: Compress entire Bundle into one zip file
asset_bundle.duplicate_name_message: Name "{name}" is already used by "{url}", please use other name.
asset_bundle.duplicate_name_messaged_auto_rename: Bundle "{newUrl}" name "{name}" is already used by "{url}", will automatically replace with "{newName}", please use other name.
asset_bundle.duplicate_reserved_keyword_message: Name "{name}" is reserved keyword, please use other name.
asset_bundle.nest_bundle: Asset Bundle "{url}" already exists, cannot nest other Asset Bundle

filter_config.title: Bundle resource filter
filter_config.preview_tips: Preview list is only for Bundle Root Asset collection reference, does not represent actual post-build package content, if actual project uses filtered resources, then removal is invalid
filter_config.empty_preview_list: After filtering, this Bundle contains no resources by default, will collect resources according to resource dependency situation

asset_bundle.empty_bundle: Current project has no Bundle, please add Bundle first
asset_bundle.bundle_build_tips: * When building Bundle independently, if current Bundle and other Bundles have mutually dependent resources, resource ownership will be determined by priority. If you want to completely export resources from other Bundles that are depended on, please ensure this Bundle has higher priority.
asset_bundle.bundle_build_platform_tips: Use corresponding platform build task as Bundle "{bundleUrl}" build configuration
asset_bundle.bundle_build_close_tip: Bundle is building, please do not close panel
asset_bundle.build_bundle_busy: Please wait for other build tasks to complete.
asset_bundle.build_bundle_params: Parameters invalid, please check build parameters
asset_bundle.preferred_options_tips: Apply these settings to all platforms. If you need special handling for a specific platform, please add a 'Platform Override'.
asset_bundle.fallback_options_tips: Fallback options will be used when building target platform according to actual options when preferred options are unavailable
asset_bundle.platform_override_empty_tip: No platform override currently, please add
asset_bundle.is_remote_fallback_tips: * Whether it is remote bundle will be determined again when building target platform according to actual options whether it is supported

texture_compress.title: Compress textures
texture_compress.same_config_name: Configuration name already exists, continue to overwrite and clear existing configuration?
texture_compress.merge: Keep original configuration and merge with imported configuration

tips.require_name: Name must exist in texture compression configuration
tips.xx_require_object: {name} in texture compression configuration must exist and be a JSON object
tips.platform_err: Current configuration platform option ({platform}) is invalid, only supports the following platform categories {supportPlatforms}
tips.texture_type_err: Current configuration format ({format}) is invalid, only supports the following formats: {supportFormats}
tips.options_quality_type_err: Current texture format quality option ({userQualityType}) is invalid, {qualityType} texture format only supports the following formats: {qualityTypeOptions}
tips.number_quality_type_err: Texture format quality option ({userQualityType}) is invalid, must be a number and range between {min} ~ {max}
tips.import_failed: Texture compression configuration import failed, please check imported configuration information
tips.user_preset_err: Project texture compression configuration data error, please check configuration
tips.enter_config_name_to_add: Please enter configuration name, press Enter to add configuration
tips.input_config_name_to_search: Please enter configuration name to search

splash_setting.title: Splash screen settings

background.title: Background settings

splash_setting.total_time_tips: Splash screen will close after project loading completes and reaches minimum display time. This configuration item is not effective on WeChat mini program and iOS platform
splash_setting.display_ratio_tips: This parameter will adjust logo display size while maintaining logo aspect ratio. Default value is 100%, at this time logo height is 18.5% of design height
splash_setting.tips:
Please select image first before enabling custom.
Supports jpg, png, jpeg format images within 5M size

is_save_dialog.title: About to close window, modified data not saved, save?

splash_setting.use_default_tip: Custom splash screen configured, but not checked during build, will use default splash screen configuration
splash_setting.information_dialog_unusual: Network exception, custom splash screen enable failed.

error.m1_with_physic_x: M1 chip compatibility issue with PhysX
